description: hinged tonkotsu with fish on front and flower on back; tree stump shaped netsuke with engraved cats; tonkotsu and netsuke attached by string with eggplant shaped bead
dimension: a (tonkotsu): H.1-1/2 x W.3-3/8 x D.1-1/2 in. (without string); b (netsuke): H.2-1/4 x W.2-1/8 x D.1-1/6 in.
title: Tonkotsu with Inlaid Fish and Netsuke
